descriptionTitle: Soli-LMS: A Comprehensive Learning Management System
description: Developed a key component of the Soli-LMS project, focusing on creating and linking project-based learning activities for learners. Implemented a system to connect projects with relevant skills, technologies, and skill levels, providing a structured learning path. This project utilized Laravel, Spatie, AdminLTE Laravel UI, PHP, and MySQL Workbenches. Explored the potential of personalized learning recommendations to enhance the learning experience.

descriptionTitle: Coding Commanders: Water Conservation Solution (SoliHackathon Winner)
description: As part of the Coding Commanders team, won first place at the SoliHackathon with a solution addressing water wastage. Developed an innovative solution that impressed the judges and earned recognition. Explored using sensor data analysis to optimize water usage.

descriptionTitle: Mentorini: A Mentoring Platform Connecting Learners and Experts
description: Developed a web platform for mentorship, connecting students and mentors using PHP, HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and Bootstrap. Designed the user interface, managed user profiles, and implemented a robust search system to facilitate meaningful connections. Explored using personalized matching algorithms to enhance the mentoring experience.
built on Next.js and React. A fast and responsive single page application.
